name: Lunex Network
description: Lunex is a Web3 multi-chain bridge network leveraging a non-custodial protocol for instant cross-chain transactions. By accessing deep liquidity and enabling seamless asset transfers across different blockchains, Lunex offers a cost-efficient, scalable alternative to traditional CEXs for DeFi traders and liquidity providers All merchant and token listing fees will be paid in LNEX, making the token deflationary and creating natural buying pressure, which helps maintain a stable floor price for LNEX.
